# alicloud\_express\_connect\_grant\_rule\_to\_cen

Provides a Express Connect Grant Rule To Cen resource.

For information about Express Connect Grant Rule To Cen and how to use it, see [What is Grant Rule To Cen](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/virtual-private-cloud/latest/grantinstancetocen).

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.196.0+.

## Example Usage

Basic Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as alicloud from "./.gen/providers/alicloud";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const alicloudCenInstanceDefault = new alicloud.cenInstance.CenInstance(
      this,
      "default",
      {
        cenInstanceName: "tf-example",
      }
    );
    const dataAlicloudAccountDefault =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudAccount.DataAlicloudAccount(
        this,
        "default_1",
        {}
      );
    /*This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.*/
    dataAlicloudAccountDefault.overrideLogicalId("default");
    const dataAlicloudExpressConnectPhysicalConnectionsDefault =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudExpressConnectPhysicalConnections.DataAlicloudExpressConnectPhysicalConnections(
        this,
        "default_2",
        {}
      );
    /*This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.*/
    dataAlicloudExpressConnectPhysicalConnectionsDefault.overrideLogicalId(
      "default"
    );
    const alicloudExpressConnectVirtualBorderRouterDefault =
      new alicloud.expressConnectVirtualBorderRouter.ExpressConnectVirtualBorderRouter(
        this,
        "default_3",
        {
          detectMultiplier: 10,
          localGatewayIp: "10.0.0.1",
          minRxInterval: 1000,
          minTxInterval: 1000,
          peerGatewayIp: "10.0.0.2",
          peeringSubnetMask: "255.255.255.252",
          physicalConnectionId: cdktf.Token.asString(
            cdktf.propertyAccess(
              dataAlicloudExpressConnectPhysicalConnectionsDefault.connections,
              ["0", "id"]
            )
          ),
          vlanId: 1,
        }
      );
    /*This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.*/
    alicloudExpressConnectVirtualBorderRouterDefault.overrideLogicalId(
      "default"
    );
    const alicloudExpressConnectGrantRuleToCenDefault =
      new alicloud.expressConnectGrantRuleToCen.ExpressConnectGrantRuleToCen(
        this,
        "default_4",
        {
          cenId: cdktf.Token.asString(alicloudCenInstanceDefault.id),
          cenOwnerId: cdktf.Token.asNumber(dataAlicloudAccountDefault.id),
          instanceId: cdktf.Token.asString(
            alicloudExpressConnectVirtualBorderRouterDefault.id
          ),
        }
      );
    /*This allows the Terraform resource name to match the original name. You can remove the call if you don't need them to match.*/
    alicloudExpressConnectGrantRuleToCenDefault.overrideLogicalId("default");
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `cenId` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the CEN instance to which you want to grant permissions.
* `cenOwnerId` - (Required, ForceNew) The user ID (UID) of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the CEN instance belongs.
* `instanceId` - (Required, ForceNew) The ID of the VBR.

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `id` - The resource ID in terraform of Grant Rule To Cen. It formats as `<cen_id>:<cen_owner_id>:<instance_id>`.

### Timeouts

The `timeouts` block allows you to specify [timeouts](https://www.terraform.io/docs/configuration-0-11/resources.html#timeouts) for certain actions:

* `create` - (Defaults to 3 mins) Used when create the Grant Rule To Cen.
* `delete` - (Defaults to 3 mins) Used when delete the Grant Rule To Cen.

## Import

Express Connect Grant Rule To Cen can be imported using the id, e.g.

```shell
$ terraform import alicloud_express_connect_grant_rule_to_cen.example <cen_id>:<cen_owner_id>:<instance_id>
```
